item.description:
PUG SOCIAL IN STOWE VERMONT!!
When: SEPTEMBER 22, 2007
Where: TOP NOTCH FIELD IN STOWE
Time: 10:00-4:00 REGISTRATION AT 9:00
? RESCUED ALUMNI PARADE
? THE GREAT PUG RACES
? BEST WRINKLES & CURLIEST TAIL CONTESTS
? PUG COSTUME CONTEST
? PUG KISSING CONTEST
? BEST PUG TRICK CONTEST
? OLDEST PUG AT SOCIAL
? PUG WHO TRAVELLED THE FURTHEST TO THE SOCIAL
? CRAP RAFFLE & SILENT AUCTION
? 50 /50 DRAWING
? FOOD / DRINK &VENDORS
? PUG HEALTH INFORMATION
? PUG NAIL TRIMMER 50% OF PRICE GOES TO GMPR
? TELLINGTON TOUCH DEMONSTRATION $$- % TO GMPR

FUN FOR ALL RAIN OR SHINE BRING CHAIRS AND SHADE
ALL PROCEEDS GO TO HELP MEDICALLY NEEDY PUGS!
For more info. Go to:www.gmpr.org or call 802 626 8280

ADMISSION IS $10.00 ADULTS AND $5.00 FOR KIDS UNDER 12.


Thanks to our sponsors of this event:

group.name: Manchester New Hampshire pug/small dog meet up group

item.name: Stowe VT. Pug Social see links at www.greenmtnpugrescue.com
